file.title: Split without quotes count

p.text: It is used to know on how many parts the text can be split in case its parts are divided with some symbol or line. In case a part of the text in quotes is found while searching, this part is ignored and searching is not done inside of it.

p.textAll:
For example, if to split a text Hi! Friend"!" How do you do? specifying "!" as a splitter, then the text will be split into 'Hi' and 'Friend"!" How do you do?' and the command will return 2 as the number of parts.
If you want to get some part of the text use the command _Split without quotes.

file.seealso:
_Split without quotes
_Delete quotes
